issue.message:
Unexpected failure during lint analysis of TestUtils.kt (this is a bug in lint or one of the libraries it depends on)
Message: () -> kotlin.String Stack: `IllegalStateException:KtLightClassForFacadeImpl$Companion.createForFacadeNoCache(KtLightClassForFacadeImpl.kt:272)←FacadeCache$FacadeCacheData$cache$1.createValue(FacadeCache.kt:30)←FacadeCache$FacadeCacheData$cache$1.createValue(FacadeCache.kt:28)←SLRUCache.get(SLRUCache.java:47)←FacadeCache.get(FacadeCache.kt:47)←KtLightClassForFacadeImpl$Companion.createForFacade(KtLightClassForFacadeImpl.kt:282)←CliKotlinAsJavaSupport.getFacadeClassesInPackage(CliKotlinAsJavaSupport.kt:40)←LightClassUtilsKt.findFacadeClass(lightClassUtils.kt:58)`
Field requires API level 24 (current min is 21): `java.lang.Float#BYTES`
Field requires API level 24 (current min is 21): `java.lang.Integer#BYTES`
Field requires API level 24 (current min is 21): `java.lang.Short#BYTES`
Field requires API level 24 (current min is 21): `java.lang.Integer#BYTES`
Field requires API level 24 (current min is 21): `java.lang.Double#BYTES`
Field requires API level 29 (current min is 21): `android.view.KeyEvent#KEYCODE_PROFILE_SWITCH`
Custom view `MiniGdxSurfaceView` is missing constructor used by tools: `(Context)` or `(Context,AttributeSet)` or `(Context,AttributeSet,int)`
`AndroidInputHandler#onTouch` should call `View#performClick` when a click is detected
issue.errorLine1: override fun onTouch(v: View, event: MotionEvent): Boolean {
